REQUEST_EMPTY.message: Describe the job or action you want me to handle before continuing.
REQUEST_EMPTY.hint: Share a short prompt so I can draft the plan.

AUTH_MISSING.message: Include your API token so I can link this request to your identity.
AUTH_MISSING.hint: Start identity setup if you haven’t yet or paste the token under Advanced → API token.

AUTH_INVALID.message: Your API token didn’t match an active identity.
AUTH_INVALID.hint: Refresh your credentials or restart identity setup, then resend the request.

IDENTITY_SETUP_REQUIRED.message: Finish identity verification in the Agent Gateway before using this one-box flow.
IDENTITY_SETUP_REQUIRED.hint: Complete the onboarding checklist so I can trust and execute actions for you.

STAKE_REQUIRED.message: Stake the minimum AGIALPHA before continuing.
STAKE_REQUIRED.hint: Add funds or reduce the job’s stake requirement, then rerun the plan.

INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.message: You need more AGIALPHA available to cover the reward and stake.
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.hint: Top up the funding wallet or lower the reward before retrying.

INSUFFICIENT_ALLOWANCE.message: Approve AGIALPHA spending from your wallet so I can move the staked funds for you.
INSUFFICIENT_ALLOWANCE.hint: Confirm the token allowance in your wallet or Expert mode, then execute again.

DEADLINE_INVALID.message: Choose a deadline at least 24 hours out and within the protocol’s maximum window.
DEADLINE_INVALID.hint: Adjust the deadline days to fit within policy and resimulate.

AA_PAYMASTER_REJECTED.message: The account abstraction paymaster rejected this request.
AA_PAYMASTER_REJECTED.hint: Retry shortly or submit the transaction manually if the sponsor is depleted.

AA_SIMULATION_FAILED.message: The bundler simulation rejected this account abstraction request.
AA_SIMULATION_FAILED.hint: Review the encoded call data or execute the transaction manually in wallet mode.

PAYMASTER_REJECTED.message: The account-abstraction paymaster rejected the request.
PAYMASTER_REJECTED.hint: Top up the paymaster or switch to Expert mode to cover gas yourself.

VALIDATION_TIMEOUT.message: Validator checks didn’t finish in time.
VALIDATION_TIMEOUT.hint: Retry in a moment or contact support if the issue persists.

DISPUTE_OPENED.message: A dispute is already open for this job.
DISPUTE_OPENED.hint: Wait for the dispute process to finish before taking further action.

DISPUTE_OPEN.message: A dispute is already open for this job.
DISPUTE_OPEN.hint: Follow the dispute workflow to resolution before retrying.

CID_MISMATCH.message: The attachment CID does not match the orchestrator record.
CID_MISMATCH.hint: Re-upload the artifact and confirm the CID before resubmitting.

RPC_TIMEOUT.hint: Retry shortly or point Advanced settings at a faster RPC endpoint.

UNKNOWN_REVERT.hint: Review orchestrator logs or rerun in Expert mode for detailed revert data.

IPFS_TEMPORARY.hint: Wait a moment and re-upload your request.

IPFS_FAILED.message: I couldn’t package your job details.
IPFS_FAILED.hint: Remove broken links or attachments and try again.

RELAY_UNAVAILABLE.message: The relayer is offline right now.
RELAY_UNAVAILABLE.hint: Switch to wallet mode or retry shortly.

JOB_ID_REQUIRED.message: Provide the jobId you want me to act on before continuing.
JOB_ID_REQUIRED.hint: Paste the job number from your receipt or status list.

JOB_BUDGET_CAP_EXCEEDED.message: Requested reward exceeds the configured cap for your organisation.
JOB_BUDGET_CAP_EXCEEDED.hint: Lower the reward or update the org policy before executing.

JOB_DEADLINE_CAP_EXCEEDED.message: Requested deadline exceeds the configured cap for your organisation.
JOB_DEADLINE_CAP_EXCEEDED.hint: Shorten the deadline or adjust the org policy before executing.

REWARD_INVALID.message: Enter the reward as a numeric AGIALPHA amount before submitting.
REWARD_INVALID.hint: Use a positive number such as 5 or 10.5.

JOB_ALREADY_FINALIZED.hint: Choose a different job or request a status update instead.

JOB_NOT_READY_FOR_FINALIZE.message: This job is still in progress.
JOB_NOT_READY_FOR_FINALIZE.hint: Wait until it’s completed and validators have approved before finalizing.

STATUS_UNKNOWN.message: I couldn’t confirm the job status.
STATUS_UNKNOWN.hint: Retry once the network responds or check later.

PLAN_HASH_REQUIRED.message: Send the plan hash from the planning step so I can link this request to its original plan.
PLAN_HASH_REQUIRED.hint: Re-run planning if you no longer have the plan hash.

PLAN_HASH_INVALID.message: Use the 32-byte plan hash from the planning step before continuing.
PLAN_HASH_INVALID.hint: Copy the full hex string that starts with 0x.

PLAN_HASH_MISMATCH.message: The plan hash doesn’t match this request.
PLAN_HASH_MISMATCH.hint: Re-run planning and retry with the latest hash.

PLAN_HASH_UNKNOWN.message: The plan hash is not recognised or has expired.
PLAN_HASH_UNKNOWN.hint: Call /onebox/plan again to generate a fresh plan before simulating or executing.

UNSUPPORTED_ACTION.hint: Rephrase the request or choose a supported workflow.

UNKNOWN.hint: Retry once and contact support with the reference code if it persists.

ORCHESTRATOR_NOT_CONFIGURED.message: Connect an orchestrator under Advanced → Orchestrator URL, then run the job again.
ORCHESTRATOR_NOT_CONFIGURED.hint: Paste the orchestrator endpoint and save before sending new requests.

API_TOKEN_MISSING.message: Add your orchestrator API token under Advanced → API token and resend the request.
API_TOKEN_MISSING.hint: Copy the token from the orchestrator console.

API_TOKEN_INVALID.hint: Mint a fresh token in the orchestrator console, update Advanced → API token, and retry.

IDENTITY_NOT_CONFIGURED.message: This orchestrator is missing its identity pack.
IDENTITY_NOT_CONFIGURED.hint: Sync the ENS roots or identity bundle and restart the orchestrator before retrying.

ESCROW_BALANCE_LOW.hint: Top up the funding wallet or lower the reward, then try again.

ESCROW_ALLOWANCE_REQUIRED.hint: Approve AGIALPHA spending (Expert mode or wallet) and rerun the request.

BLOCKED.hint: Provide the missing fields or adjust the budget before continuing.

OVER_BUDGET.message: Simulation detected the plan is over budget.
OVER_BUDGET.hint: Lower the reward or raise the cap before retrying.

RUN_NOT_FOUND.message: The run status could not be located.
RUN_NOT_FOUND.hint: Refresh the page and try again.

RUN_FAILED.message: The orchestrator reported a failure while executing the plan.
RUN_FAILED.hint: Review the logs, address the issue, and resubmit once resolved.

DEFAULT_REWARD_APPLIED.message: Demo mode applied a default reward for you.
DEFAULT_REWARD_APPLIED.hint: Set an explicit reward before running this plan in production.

DEFAULT_DEADLINE_APPLIED.message: Demo mode applied a default deadline for you.
DEFAULT_DEADLINE_APPLIED.hint: Choose a deadline that matches your requirements before executing for real.

LOW_REWARD.message: The reward looks low for this type of job.
LOW_REWARD.hint: Consider increasing the payout so qualified agents stay interested.

SHORT_DEADLINE.hint: Give agents more than two days when possible to reduce risk.

LONG_DEADLINE.hint: Shorten the window to keep the work moving.

STATUS_UNCERTAIN.message: I could not confirm the current status.
STATUS_UNCERTAIN.hint: Retry after syncing with the network.

TOOL_NOT_ALLOWED.message: This plan requires a tool that isn’t approved for your organisation.
TOOL_NOT_ALLOWED.hint: Remove the tool from the request or update your policy whitelist before proceeding.
